entry.title: mid-term bitcoin security (Re: Warning message when running wallet in Windows XP (or drop support?))
entry.summary: In an email exchange on April 16th, 2014, Adam Back suggested rebranding Bitcoin addresses as "invoice numbers". He believed that this could help avoid confusion when it comes to double paying invoices. This idea was supported by Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist who noted that BitPay already uses similar language.
